page.title: 06RECREATION, BAUMBER HEMINGBY
page.content: There are several social activities in Baumber and Hemingby. There is a Ladies club at Hemingby village hall. Ladies club meets once a month. There are about forty members. An evening meeting lasts about two hours. They have visiting speakers and demonstrations. Once a lady went to demonstrate how to make silk flowers. They go on mystery tours. They have meals and parties. They have a party at Christmas every year. There is a bingo every Friday and it is at Baumber or Hemingby village hall. It starts at 7.30 and ends at 9.00. Quite a lot of people go to bingo. The prizes are donated by the people that go.The caller is Mrs Taylor. At the end there is a raffle and at half time there is tea, biscuits and sweets. {Goto page 7. {
